properties.question: What is Solvatten and how does it work?
properties.answer: Solvatten is a portable water purifier that uses solar energy to make water safe for drinking, cooking, and hygiene. It combines heat and ultraviolet (UV) radiation from the sun to treat contaminated water in a simple, sustainable way. The water is purified by placing the kit in direct sunlight for 2-6 hours, depending on the weather conditions.

properties.question: How much water can Solvatten treat at once?
properties.answer: Each Solvatten kit can treat up to 10 liters of water at a time. The process can be repeated multiple times a day depending on sunlight availability, allowing families to purify enough water for their daily needs.

properties.question: Is Solvatten safe to use for children and elderly?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten is designed to be safe for people of all ages. It uses a natural process with no chemicals, ensuring that the water is safe for consumption, including children and elderly.

properties.question: What kind of water can Solvatten purify?
properties.answer: Solvatten can treat water from various sources, including rivers, lakes, and rainwater. However, it is important to avoid using water that contains heavy contamination such as chemicals or industrial waste, as Solvatten is not designed to remove such pollutants.

properties.question: How long does the Solvatten kit last?
properties.answer: Solvatten kits are built to last for up to 7-10 years with proper use and care. The durable materials are resistant to both weather conditions and wear and tear.

properties.question: How can I tell if the water is safe to drink after using Solvatten?
properties.answer: Solvatten includes a visual indicator in the kit that shows when the water has reached a safe temperature and UV exposure level. Once the indicator shows that the water is ready, it is safe for consumption.

properties.question: Can Solvatten be used during cloudy days?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten can still work on cloudy days, but the purification process will take longer. It may take up to 6 hours or more for the water to be fully treated depending on weather conditions.

properties.question: Is Solvatten environmentally friendly?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten is highly sustainable. It reduces the need for boiling water over firewood and other fossil fuels, helping to decrease deforestation and carbon emissions. Additionally, it doesnâ€™t require batteries or electricity, making it an eco-friendly solution.

properties.question: Can Solvatten be used for purposes other than drinking water?
properties.answer: Yes, water treated by Solvatten can also be used for cooking, washing, and hygiene purposes. The kit provides hot water, which is useful for various household needs.

properties.question: What maintenance is required for Solvatten?
properties.answer: Solvatten requires minimal maintenance. After each use, it is recommended to rinse the unit and let it dry. The transparent panels should be kept clean to ensure maximum sunlight exposure. Occasionally check for any wear and tear on the seals and other parts.

properties.question: Where can I buy Solvatten?
properties.answer: Solvatten is available for purchase through the official Solvatten website, as well as through partner organizations and distributors. You can also contact local NGOs or humanitarian organizations that work with water access to inquire about availability in your region.

properties.question: What are the benefits of using Solvatten in remote areas?
properties.answer: In remote areas without reliable access to clean water or electricity, Solvatten provides a self-sustaining solution for safe drinking water. It reduces the need for firewood to boil water, saving both time and resources while promoting better health and hygiene.

properties.question: Does Solvatten eliminate all harmful microorganisms from the water?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten is effective at killing bacteria, viruses, and parasites through a combination of solar UV radiation and heat. However, it is not designed to remove chemical pollutants or heavy metals from the water.

properties.question: Where do you pour in the water?

properties.value: Through the openings with black caps and filters.
Through any of the openings.
Through the narrow opening at the bottom of the container.
Through the large opening at the back of the container.

properties.question: Why should you always fill Solvatten all the way to the top?

properties.value: Because the indicator works properly when fully covered by water.
Because leaving space lets the water expand.
Because filling it halfway up leaves the water boiling.
Because overfilling can cause it to get dirty.

properties.question: How should the water look before you pour it into Solvatten?

properties.value: It should be cloudy or dirty.
It should have bits and pieces in it.
It should be clear enough to see through a glassful.
It should be yellowish or brown.

properties.value: Press once the water starts to boil.
Press after Solvatten has been in the sun for an hour.
Press so it shows a red face when you start.
Press after Solvatten has been in the sun for five minutes.

properties.question: How do you place Solvatten when you start using it?

properties.value: Place Solvatten in a shaded area, out of direct sunlight.
Place Solvatten at a 90Â°C angle facing the sun, preferably in a no-wind or shadow spot.
Place Solvatten in a shaded area with little sunlight.
Place Solvatten in direct sunlight with wind to help it dry faster.

properties.question: When is the water safe to drink?

properties.value: When it has boiled for around 10 minutes.
When the water is clear and cool.
When the water steams and feels cool to touch.
When the face on the indicator turns green and its within 24 hours.

properties.question: Where do you pour the water out?

properties.value: From the bottom of the container.
From the openings with black caps and filters.
From the openings with the white caps.
From the spout on the side of the container.

properties.question: How should you store the treated water?

properties.value: Keep it in an open container.
Keep it in a clean, closed pot away from the ground.
Keep it in a clear bottle.
Keep it in the Solvatten kit.

properties.question: How might you use the hot water?

properties.value: For personal hygiene, cooking food, or use it for tea or coffee.
For cleaning the roof, washing your phone, and drying clothes.
For washing the dog, polishing furniture, and making ice cubes.
For watering plants, cleaning shoes, and filling a swimming pool.

properties.question: Why should you never use sand when washing Solvatten?

properties.value: Sand helps clean the container faster.
Sand scratches the plastic and reduces the effectiveness of Solvatten.
Sand makes the container heat up too quickly.
Sand clears the filters faster.

properties.question: What do you do when the weather is cloudy?

properties.value: Nothing. You can still drink the water after a few hours.
Boil the water to make it clean and hot by using the source of energy at hand.
Protect it with an umbrella.
Hold it high.

properties.question: What is the main job of the clear plastic covers on the Solvatten kit?

properties.value: They reflect solar radiation to reduce exposure to the water.
They let 90Â°C of solar radiation through to heat the water.
They block UV radiation to protect the water.
They block heat to keep the water cooler.

properties.question: Why is UV radiation important for cleaning the water in the Solvatten kit?

properties.value: Because it destroys harmful microorganisms by damaging their DNA.
Because it helps the water stay cold.
Because it makes the water taste better.
Because it makes the water look clearer.

properties.question: Why is heat important in cleaning the water in Solvatten?

properties.value: Because it helps filter out larger particles, making the water clearer.
Because it activates the UV radiation, helping it work better.
Because it destroys microorganisms by raising the temperature to 50-60Â°C.
Because it speeds up the cleaning process, making the water safer.

properties.question: How does higher altitude affect the Solvatten kit?

properties.value: The kit becomes less effective because the atmosphere absorbs more solar energy at higher altitudes.
The kit becomes more effective because thinner air allows more solar energy to reach it.
The kitâ€™s performance is the same at all altitudes, as solar radiation doesnâ€™t change.
The kit works better at lower altitudes because the air keeps more heat.

properties.question: What is the best way to position Solvatten to get the most solar energy?

properties.value: Stand it up straight for consistent energy all year.
Keep it at a fixed angle to keep heat in, no matter the time or season.
Place it parallel to the sun and adjust it in the morning and evening.
Tilt it at a 90Â°C angle such that the lid ring aligns with its shadow.

properties.question: What is one of the key long-term benefits of using Solvatten, particularly for women in households?

properties.value: Women gain access to more expensive household products.
Women can exclusively switch to electric cooking methods, reducing their reliance on firewood.
Women can avoid the costs of cooking oil.
Women can reduce their daily time spent collecting water and firewood, allowing for more time for education and income-generating activities.

properties.question: How can someone save money by using Solvatten?

properties.value: By not owning one, as the Solvatten kit itself is an expense.
By connecting it to the electricity grid.
By using it to generate electricity for your home.
By eliminating the need to buy fuel for boiling water, such as firewood or gas.

properties.question: How does Solvatten contribute to the preparation of food for small businesses?

properties.value: It provides warm water for baking and cooking, speeding up food prep.
It generates steam to cook food faster.
It helps keep food cool by cooling water.
It keeps the dishes fresh during preparation.

properties.question: Which of the following activities best demonstrates how Solvatten helps entrepreneurs increase their income?

properties.value: Solvatten is used to cool beverages for safe storage.
Solvatten is used to make safe drinking water that can be sold as a product.
Solvatten has no impact on any sales.
Solvatten is used to filter food products before sale.

properties.question: How does Solvatten support communities in rural areas?

properties.value: By providing a reliable source of clean water.
By helping to create strong internet connections for remote communities.
By offering a substitute for rainwater harvesting systems.
By allowing people to instantly grow crops with purified water.

When not in use, close Solvatten and store it indoors to protect it. Before using it again, rinse the kit with water. 

Solvatten is made of high-quality plastic and designed for long-lasting durability with daily use. While it is robust, it should still be handled with care. If there is a hole in the container, the lid is too scratched, or the indicator doesnâ€™t turn green, itâ€™s time to replace the kit.
If the indicator is broken, it can easily be replaced. Contact your local Solvatten representative for assistance.

If your Solvatten kit is still usable but you no longer need it, return it to the provider or someone who will use it. If damaged or leaking, repurpose it for storing beans, lentils, or other items. Solvatten kits are made of recyclable plastic, please recycle them at your local recycling facility when they are no longer usable.
If neighbors take turns looking after each other's Solvatten kits, it helps prevent theft and keeps the kits safe.
Detergents work better and stains dissolve more easily with hot water from Solvatten.
Offering clean, hot water for handwashing before serving meals with Solvatten is a welcoming gesture.
Using hot water from Solvatten makes plucking chicken feathers easier.
If you have any more tips or tricks, please feel free to contact us at hallo@solvatten.org.

properties.title: Before you start...
properties.block1: Know your water source. Use the water that comes from your regular source. If you have doubts about the quality of water, you should check with your local water advisor. Please note that Solvatten only treats water contaminated with micro-biological pathogens. Solvatten does not remove chemical contamination or arsenic or fluoride.

properties.value: By starting as the sun comes up, you have the best chance of successfully treating water several times a day.
Make sure the indicator is RED with a sad smiley when you start. If the indicator is not red, push the yellow Sun Button to reset it.
The water should be clear enough to see through when poured in a glass (less than 40 NTU).
If the water is very muddy, pre-filter it first (see how in Chapter 10).
Open ALL FOUR caps to make it easier to fill.
Pour the water through the openings with BLACK CAPS and filters. The filters make the water less muddy and remove larger micro-organisms.
Pour the water from a height. Fill Solvatten to the top so that the water surrounds the indicator. Otherwise, the indicator will not work.
Tighten all four caps firmly but do not use force. Close the caps when Solvatten is upright.
If the indicator is GREEN and shows a happy smiley you should reset the indicator by pushing the yellow Sun Button. Do not push the button if it is already RED.
IMPORTANT: The face on the indicator must be RED and a sad smiley should appear when you start.

properties.title: Place Solvatten in a good spot

properties.value: Place Solvatten facing the sun. The kit should be fully open with the transparent surfaces facing directly towards the sun.

Adjust the position to a 90Â° angle to the sun. The ring in the center of the lid will cast a shadow and help you find the correct angle.

IMPORTANT: If laid flat or at too steep an angle, Solvatten will work more slowly.
Make sure Solvatten is sheltered from the wind. It should be in a place where no shade can reach it. Leave Solvatten in the sun for 2-6 hours.
If you place Solvatten on an elevated surface, such as a bed of hay or something similar, this will help it heat up faster.
Protect Solvatten from the wind. A large bag cut open can be used to provide shelter and make Solvatten work faster.
If the weather is cold, use a pillow or a blanket to provide insulation and speed up the process.

properties.title: The face turns green and happy

properties.value: The water will be very hot after a while.
When the temperature reaches 55Â°C, a green smiley appears and the water will be safe to drink.

properties.title: Use the white caps when pouring out the water

properties.value: IMPORTANT: Pour the treated water through the openings with the WHITE CAPS.
Be careful! The water can be very hot.
Use hot water for personal hygiene and taking a bath. If it is too hot, you should let it cool first.

Pour water into a tippy tap stand. Remember to wash your hands with soap and water from Solvatten after visiting the toilet, before eating, and preparing food. This will improve your and your family membersâ€™ health.
Pre-heating water for cooking will save you a lot of fuel. Solvatten can replace a lot of firewood, coal, and gas.
With Solvatten, you have safe water to prepare and rinse your food.
To make more batches of water with Solvatten, pour the water into a clean container. Always use a lid and a tap to avoid re-contamination. Keep the container away from the floor.
To keep the water hot, pour it into a thermos.
Place Solvatten in the shade to cool the water; it will soon be ready to drink.
Keep your treated water in Solvatten or in clean jars with lids to avoid re-contamination. Water treated through Solvatten can safely be stored for 24 hours.

properties.title: When the water is very muddy

properties.value: The water should be clear enough to see through when poured in a glass (less than 40 NTU).
If the water is very muddy, you should filter or sediment it (leave the water for a while to allow the particles to sink to the bottom).

Another option is to make a sand and stone filter using two buckets and a tap. Line one bucket with a cloth, then add layers of sand and stones of different sizes. Pour water in and let it filter through.

You can also make a simple sand filter using a plastic bottle. Cut off the top, place fabric at the bottom, and fill it with sand and stones. Pour water in and let it filter through. Moringa seeds can also help reduce the waterâ€™s turbidity (cloudiness).
If the filter looks dirty or clogged, take it out and rinse it with water.
Rinse the filter with clean water, holding it gently between your fingers. You can also boil the filter in water for a few minutes.

If the filter is damaged or missing, you can make your own. Take a large piece of cloth and fold it into two or three layers. The new filter should be large enough to cover the opening where you pour in the water.
Place the folded cloth over the opening and cut around the edge. If the filter ring is gone, tie a string around the opening to keep the fabric in position.
Rinse Solvatten with water when it looks dirty.
IMPORTANT: Avoid scratching. Do not wipe or scrub the transparent surface with sand. To get rid of dirt and dust on the outside, rinse the container with water.
Clean the inside of Solvatten with hot water using a soft plastic bottle brush.
Make the plastic bottle bush by wrapping a fresh twig with a cloth.
Put a handful of dry beans, lentils, or woolen balls into Solvatten. Add a cupful of clean water.
Shake Solvatten and rinse out the water to remove any mud inside. You can also add lemon or lime juice to help clean the kit.

Do not put sand into Solvatten or scrub it on the outside with sand.

Do not leave Solvatten empty and open, with the caps closed, in direct sunlight.

Avoid rough handling.

Do not use Solvatten to transport water over long distances.

Do not fill Solvatten with muddy water.

properties.title: Make money and reduce the workload with Solvatten

properties.value: Solvatten adds value to small businesses that rely on water for their goods and services, supporting entrepreneurship and improving livelihoods.
Washing a cowâ€™s udder with clean water from Solvatten before milking makes the milk safer and extends its freshness.

Baking sun-buns with clean, hot water from Solvatten is simple and helps generate income. 

Tip: Avoid chlorine water, as it prevents wild yeast and fermentation.
With +75Â°C water, you can prepare rice without boiling. Wrap and insulate the pot, soak the rice, and it will be ready in about 2 hours.

properties.title: Beauty as a source of extra income

properties.value: Hairdressers and beauty salons can use Solvatten to get clean, hot water for washing clients' hair and other services.
Selling cool, safe bottled water from Solvatten can help boost income.
Earn extra income by making and selling fruit juice with clean, safe water from Solvatten. It ensures high quality and shows care for your customers.
Using Solvatten to wash vegetables ensures they are safe and clean.
Restaurants and street vendors use water from Solvatten to serve customers and for washing up, as hot water helps dissolve grease.
Hot water from Solvatten is useful for dyeing colors and bending twigs when making traditional baskets.
Selling eggs with clean, hot water from Solvatten is easy, helps generate income, and uses less energy.
